title: Which is the best app to track a person's location? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you’re an IT admin and planning to track your mobile workforce deployed with enterprise-owned devices, then I’d suggest you go for an Enterprise Mobility Management (EMM) solution, without a second thought. The following are some of the key features from Hexnode MDM that helps you track and manage on-field staff with ease. Cross-platform supportThe ability to manage a wide range of device platforms such as Android, iOS, macOS, Fire OS, tvOS, Windows, etc. Over-the-air distributionThe method of distributing apps and documents completely wirelessly. Location trackingHelps to retrieve the location of lost or misplaced devices easily. Remote lock/wipeThe ability to remotely lock/wipe a managed device upon device loss or theft. Device lockdownKiosk mode to restrict devices to a specific app or a group of apps. Dynamic device groupingDynamic grouping to automatically change the members of a device group based on specific conditions. GeofencingHelps in giving real-time updates when a device goes in or out of the specified locations. Here’re some use-cases too, Tracking time the employees spend on job sitesFetching the location details of vehicles periodically as well as instantaneouslyMaking the calculation of billable hours easierReal-time monitoring to ensure minimal customer wait times
